p: Although many human cases of ZIKV and DENV infections have been reported in Thailand, there are few reports of ZIKV circulation in wild-caught mosquitoes [ 29]. In this study, entomological surveillance for arthropod-borne viruses was conducted in Kampheang Phet (KPP) Province, Thailand, a dengue-endemic area where human Zika cases had been recently reported. Aedes mosquitoes were screened for ZIKV and DENV and the virus sequences were analyzed. Findings from this study can be used as the critical first step toward developing a routine entomological surveillance and vector control program in Thailand.
